channel.title: Having Problems With Connection
channel.description: Alright My Freind and I are having Problems with the Connection For Our server . People can Only join Through Local Host which doesnt make Sense Because Everything Is Fine Plus we Changed the GUI.JAVA to my Own... ANY SUGGESTIONS ON FIXING THIS PROBLEM ??? Besause i want this server online Really Badly .. NOTE - My freind the HOST doesnt use a Router he only Has a Modem . PLEASE HELP ME .
